## IEqualsDelta.eqDelta() method

Returns `true` if this value equals `o` with optional allowance for given tolerance `eps`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eqDelta(o: T, eps?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  o | <code>T</code> | 2nd value to test |
|  eps | <code>number</code> | tolerance (usually defaults to <code>DEFAULT_EPS</code>) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
